title: Default ping is for assistance
body: My default ping when i just tapped w before was danger but now it is assist. Has anyone got any ideas how i can change this? Are there any ways i can test my mouse and keyboard to see if they are functioning?

replies.body:
Im tired in a custom twice and now v is casting danger ping instead of assistance, thank you. I wont confuse my teammates through tapping w automatically now. Pinging for assistance at my team near an inhib for example, when I want them to back instead of overstay does give the wrong message. I dont know what i've done but it worked so far. I tried setting my controls to default before and that didnt fix this???????? 

Anyway thank you, have a good day{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Uhhh... v not w sorry. I will try what you said but now its patching so i cant log in.

To clarify, do you mean you had a Danger ping set to your W key?  Is everything bound correctly on your keybindings settings?  If so, try a config reset to see if that helps.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know!
